nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_minimum_depth
nml_option.description: Minimum depth where column contains all water-filled cells. The first layer with refBottomDepth greater than this value is included in whole, i.e. no partial bottom cells are used in this layer.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0, but typically greater than 10 m.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_file
nml_option.description: Path to the depth initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension defining the number of vertical levels in input files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing mid-depth of levels in temperature and salinity initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_depth_conversion_factor
nml_option.description: Conversion factor for depth levels. Should convert units on input depth levels to meters.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_temperature_file
nml_option.description: Path to the temperature initial condition file. Must be interpolated to vertical layers defined in depth file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_salinity_file
nml_option.description: Path to the salinity initial condition file. Must be interpolated to vertical layers defined in depth file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of latitude lines in tracer initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Name of the dimension that determines number of longitude lines in tracer initial condition files.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_temperature_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing temperature in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_salinity_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing salinity in salinity initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for tracers should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing latitude coordinates for tracer values in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Name of the variable containing longitude coordinates for tracer values in temperature initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_tracer_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate tracer data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_smooth_TS_iterations
nml_option.description: Number of smoothing iterations on temperature and salinity.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value greater or equal to 0.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_piston_velocity
nml_option.description: Parameter controlling rate to which SST and SST are restored.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_interior_restore_rate
nml_option.description: Parameter controlling rate to which interior temperature and salinity are restored.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_file
nml_option.description: Path to the topography initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the latitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the longitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for topography should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the latitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the longitude in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_topography_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the topography in the topography file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_smooth_topography
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if topograhy should be smoothed after being interpolated.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_cull_inland_seas
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if inland seas should be removed.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_file
nml_option.description: Path to the windstress initial condition file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_nlat_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the latitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_nlon_dimname
nml_option.description: Dimension name for the longitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_latlon_degrees
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls if the Lat/Lon fields for windstress should be converted to radians. True means input is degrees, false means input is radians.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_lat_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the latitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_lon_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the longitude in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_zonal_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the zonal component of windstress in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_meridional_varname
nml_option.description: Variable name for the meridional component of windstress in the windstress file.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_method
nml_option.description: Method to interpolate windstress data to MPAS mesh.

nml_option.name: config_global_ocean_windstress_conversion_factor
nml_option.description: Factor to convert input windstress to N m^{-1}

var.name: smoothedLevels
var.description: Temporary space to hold smoothed maxLevelCell to allow bit-reproducibility.

var.name: smoothedTemperature
var.description: Temporary space to hold smoothed tracer to allow bit-reproducibility.

var.name: smoothedSalinity
var.description: Temporary space to hold smoothed tracer to allow bit-reproducibility.

var.name: cullStack
var.description: Temporary space to hold a stack for culling inland seas.

var.name: touchedCell
var.description: Temporary space to a hold mask if the cell has been touched or not, when culling inland seas.

var.name: oceanCell
var.description: Temporary space to a hold mask if the cell is an active ocean cell or not.

var.name: cullStackSize
var.description: Integer to hold the size of the cullStack for each block.
